## Database Information

- **Name**: [e.g. CockroachDB]
- **Version**: [e.g. 23.1]
- **Python driver**: [e.g. psycopg2]
- **Documentation**: [link to database documentation]

## Use Case

Why you need this database supported. Describe your use case and how this database would be used with Universal Agent Connector.

## Willing to Contribute?

- [ ] Yes, I can help implement this plugin
- [ ] No, requesting community support

## Additional Context

Connection requirements, special features, compatibility notes, or any other relevant information about the database.

## Implementation Notes (if contributing)

If you're planning to implement this, please include:
- Python driver/library you plan to use
- Any special connection requirements
- Known limitations or considerations
- Estimated complexity
